original_text: Now Pharaoh should look for a clever man. He should look for a man who knows what is right and wrong. Tell him to rule over the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 이제 바로께서는 명철하고 지혜 있는 사람을 택하여 애굽 땅을 다스리게 하시고

sentences.original_text: Now Pharaoh should look for a clever man.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 바로는 지혜로운 사람을 찾아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: He should look for a man who knows what is right and wrong.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 옳고 그름을 아는 사람을 찾아야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: Tell him to rule over the land of Egypt.
